code: import*as actionTypes from"../actions/actionTypes";import intialState from"./intialState";export default function changeCategoryReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:intialState.currentCategory;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.CHANGE_CATEGORY:return action.payload;default:return state;}}
